home.jobTitle: I'm Ye Han, a professional Software Engineer
home.info: Hello, I am Ye Han, a Software Engineer
home.info1: I specialize in industrial informatization, with
home.info2: years extensive expertise in the development of MES (Manufacturing Execution Systems) and WMS (Warehouse Management Systems). My core technical stack includes C#, ASP.NET Core, Vue, and SQL Server.
home.info3: Throughout my career, I have excelled at handling complex business logic and quickly responding to on-site requirements. I am adept at bridging the gap between technical systems and production workflows through efficient design and system optimizations, ensuring that software solutions align perfectly with operational needs.

head.title: Experience
head.subtitle: Focused on MES/WMS, industrial systems, and high-concurrency architecture.

points: Responsibilities: iterate core business engines for MES and WMS systems and upgrade foundational architecture.
Technical challenge: stability governance and high-frequency database read/write optimization for 24/7 factory operations.
Responsibilities: built the WMS system from 0 to 1, covering business modeling, architecture selection, and standards.
Team leadership: led a 3-5 member team for requirement breakdown, code review, and cross-department coordination.

items.company: Wuxi Lead Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd.
points: Responsibilities: new module design for WMS in the new energy equipment industry and database performance optimization under high concurrency.
Core work: solved complex logistics cost-calculation algorithms to improve analytics on massive data volumes.

items.company: Guan Cheng Information Technology (Suzhou) Co., Ltd.
points: Responsibilities: led technical solution design for multiple medical industry projects, participated in early blueprint planning, ensured GMP compliance.
Responsibilities: developed EAP system modules and ensured stable operation with accurate real-time MES data exchange.

items.role: Rongdi Intelligent MES/WMS Distributed Architecture Optimization
points: Performance bottleneck resolution: reduced deadlocks during peak production by partitioned indexing and slow SQL refactoring; core API response improved by 30%.
High-reliability message center: built RabbitMQ-based async distribution with producer confirms and dead-letter queues for reliable notifications.

items.role: Changshu Yongqiang WMS Smart Warehouse Platform (0-1)
points: Core architecture design: built WMS framework from scratch using DDD to decouple business logic and manage massive SKU volumes.
Delivery value: led 8-month delivery and rollout, improving inventory turnover by 20% and operational efficiency by 40%.

items.role: Wuxi Lead Intelligent WMS Logistics Scheduling Engine
points: Decision algorithm: designed logistics pricing and routing strategy module, integrated major logistics APIs for multi-factor cost optimization.
SQL deep optimization: rewrote complex aggregations for million-row inventory logs using execution plan analysis, reducing reports to seconds.

items.role: Tianzhuchangyun Medical WMS Dynamic Label System
points: Flexible architecture: created dynamic tree-structured packaging labels to meet strict medical device traceability requirements.
Algorithm implementation: recursive label hierarchy with dynamic front-end components, enabling infinite levels without secondary development.

items.role: Shenzhen Anbao Medical WMS & ERP Integration
points: Frontend engineering: built modular responsive dashboards with Vue + Ant Design; higher-order components improved similar page delivery by 40%.
Data consistency: designed a highly available Web API integration layer with idempotency and distributed compensation to ensure real-time sync.
Industrial-grade communication: integrated equipment and system layers via SECS/GEM and OPC; custom monitoring enabled millisecond state awareness.
Mass data handling: streamed CSV test files with batch async ingestion to avoid OOM, improving throughput over 3x.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.subtitle: Feel free to reach out anytime for collaboration or opportunities.
